name: ext-msg-core
description: Messaging core: canonical msg.envelope_v1 + msg.rr.entry_v1 + driver interface (pinned via arch/msg).
docs:
Messaging core: canonical msg.envelope_v1 + msg.rr.entry_v1 + driver interface (pinned via arch/msg).

Modules:
- std.msg.spec
- std.msg.envelope
- std.msg.rr
- std.msg.driver
- std.msg.tests

Usage:
- Add dependency: x07 pkg add ext-msg-core@0.1.1
- Pin topics in arch/msg/index.x07msg.json.
- Encode envelopes with std.msg.envelope.encode_v1.
- Decode envelopes with std.msg.envelope.decode_v1.
